review.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Lingyang is a melee main damage dealer with one of the most unique play styles in the game which you’ll either love or absolutely hate","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":". Similar to his peers - Calcharo and Encore - Lingyang deals the majority of his damage during his Ultimate which offers him an immense damage increase and accelerates his access to his special enhanced state that empowers all of his normal combos. But unlike the other two ultimate-focused standard characters, Lingyang spends the entirety of his ultimate in the air… ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"yes Lingyang can fly for better or worse, meaning you’ll be attacking, dodging, and interacting with enemies in an entirely new dimension. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Outside of the fact that Lingyang can fly, he primarily deals single-target damage. While attacking in his airborne state, Lingyang has great potential to juggle one or many (non-elite or boss) enemies into the sky with him, effectively rendering them useless while hitting them. Compared to Encore and Calcharo his overall damage output is slightly lower, but his combos themselves are more forgiving than both of them, but this is true only assuming you can get oriented while in the air... which actually isn't that easy. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Somewhat lower damage than his competitors but with a unique playstyle - so what makes Lingyang a less attractive pick as a main damage dealer? His flying is the reason - it's both his biggest blessing and hindrance. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"While airborne the control you have as a player over direction, orientation, and most importantly dodging is far more limited.","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" Additionally, it’s very possible to encounter issues with boss and enemy hitboxes while airborne, causing you to miss entire attacks and combos leading to large damage losses. Lower control over both offense and defense will lead to more dangerous fights and less consistent damage, making Lingyang a challenging character to play for lesser or equal rewards compared to alternatives. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Can fly!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Unique playstyle not found anywhere else,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Gains the most free stats from his baseline S0 kit of any character thanks to the ultimate boost, ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Button mashing friendly playstyle where you can’t really mess up,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Works really well with Sanhua, a fellow Glacio character,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Can juggle non-elite or boss enemies in the air, comboing them continuously and rendering them immobile. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
